name: 20th Century Limited
description: Originally served on the train that ran between NYC and Chicago in the first half of the 20th century, incidentally named the 20th Century Limited.
steps: Shake Lillet Blanc, creme de cacao, lemon juice, and gin in cocktail shaker with ice until well chilled.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
footnote: As a bonus, garnish with a lemon twist.
